ul.li: With a value pair of "14%84%", the point 14% across and 84% down the image is to be placed at the point 14% across and 84% down the element.

body.p: If statement above is true, this paragraph should have a flag image where the point 14% across and 84% down the image should be placed at the corresponding point of the paragraph text. The rules applied are "p {background-image: url(flagbg.gif); background-position: 14%84%;}" Also "p {background-color: aqua; background-repeat: no-repeat;} ".
